about_the_game:
The Nexus Touch Spider

As a fast-paced, arcade-style grapple shooter, NEXUS TOUCH SPIDER offers an exciting journey. It takes players back to the beloved era of vintage arcade amusement with its short yet intense gameplay segments, vibrant and dynamic landscapes, and global rankings.

You will enter an exhilarating challenge as you swing, fire, and crash your way to the centre of the SWARM before the clock runs out, armed only with a grappling hook and reliable sidearms. Fast reflexes won't be enough to get you through this; you'll need to come up with a plan and carefully consider what you'll do next.

quick-paced. difficult. thrilling.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR (Windows MR headsets ARE NOT supported - we're working on it)
  • Additional Notes: Steam VR / Quest / Quest 2 / Meta Quest Pro / Rift / Rift S / Vive / Index (Windows MR headsets ARE NOT supported - we're working on it)
